article_title: CBO: Federal budget deficit, national debt to soar
article_text:
Edmond, OK (73034)

Today

Mostly cloudy early followed by partly cloudy skies and gusty winds this afternoon. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. High near 85F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy and windy this evening then becoming cloudy after midnight. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low 68F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph.
